news.title: Bitcoin And Altcoins Breakout As Stock Market Momentum Fades: BTC, ETH And SOL Outlook
news.snippet: Bitcoin ( BTC-USD ), the most sought-after and respected crypto, corrected by 36%, with the total crypto market cap suffering a similar drop. Others were hit even harder, with 50% corrections seen in XRP ( XRP-USD) and Solana ( SOL-USD ), and brutal 70% drops in names like Cardano ( ADA-USD ).

news.title: BMNR Stock Rises as Tom Lee's BitMine Invests $200M in MrBeast's Beast Industries
news.snippet: Tom Lee's BitMine, which is the largest Ethereum treasury company, has announced a significant investment in MrBeast's Beast Industries. This has sparked a surge in the BMNR stock, which is already up over 16% year-to-date (YTD).
